references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the superior performance of diffusion models over GANs in image synthesis, a key foundation for the work presented.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a fundamental technique used throughout the current diffusion model landscape.
